name: INURE (SeanSwizzy)
description:
INURE: Death is Only the Beginning

INURE is a fast-paced challenging platformer where the player will struggle to become victorious!

INURE has 6 action-packed levels all with their own unique soundtracks. Will you be able to Inure to win?

How to Play:
Move and Climb: Arrow Keys
Jump: Space Bar
Shoot: B Key
Controller Support is there, but it is 50/50, players are more than welcome to try it!
